constraints.error¶

class Error(*contents)[source]¶

Output of a constraint check.

merge(err)[source]¶

Merge the argument into this Error object.

Parameters:err – The Error object to merge.
Return type:An Error object
unwrap()[source]¶

Convert the error object to a tree-like structure consisting of lists and dicts. The leaves of the tree are strings.
